entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
